name: Brazen Thief
description:
In this cruel world, everyone survives as best they can, someone grows vegetables and fruits, and someone steals them. Our main character decided to go the easy way. Help him escape with his prey. Each of his opponents is a huge danger. You must hold out as long as possible.

Brazen Thief - Top Down View is a game where you have to fight off all the enemies. Your hero is a thief and he will not be allowed to leave so easily. Throw carrots at them, but do not forget to pick it up again. Knock out medicines from them to last as long as possible. I know you will succeed!
Game Features:

- Difficulty
- Beautiful Pixel Art
- Atmosphere
- Music
